org.grules.script
[Groovy] Class RulesScript

java.lang.Object
  org.grules.script.RulesScript
All Implemented Interfaces:
RulesScriptAPI
class RulesScript

Encapsulates state of a rules script.

Property Summary
java.util.Map invalidParameters

Parameters that did no pass validation GroupName -> ParameterName -> ErrorProperties.
java.util.Map missingRequiredParameters

Parameters that are missing from input but required by a rules script.
java.util.Map parametersWithMissingDependency

Parameters that depend on other parameters that are missing from input.

addParameter

applyRuleToOptionalParameter

@Override
void applyRuleToOptionalParameter(java.lang.String parameterName, groovy.lang.Closure subrulesSeqClosure, java.lang.Object defaultValue)
Applies a preprocessing rule to an optional parameter.
Parameters:
parameterName - parameter name
subrulesSeqClosure - closure that returns a subrules sequence
defaultValue - default parameter value

applyRuleToParametersList

@Override
void applyRuleToParametersList(java.lang.String ruleName, java.util.Set requiredParameters, java.util.Map optionalParameters, groovy.lang.Closure subrulesSeqClosure)
Applies a rule to a list of parameters.
Parameters:
ruleName - a name of the rule used for reports
requiredParameters - a set of required parameters
optionalParameters - a map of parameters names and their default values
subrulesSeqClosure - closure that returns a subrules sequence

applyRuleToRequiredParameter

@Override
void applyRuleToRequiredParameter(java.lang.String parameterName, groovy.lang.Closure subrulesSeqClosure)
Applies a preprocessing rule to a required parameter.
Parameters:
parameterName - parameter name
subrulesSeqClosure - closure that returns a subrules sequence

applyRules

void applyRules()
Runs the script to apply preprocessing rules to input parameters.

changeGroup

@Override
void changeGroup(java.lang.String group)
Adds direct parameters variables to script, so they can be accessed without a group prefix, for example: id instead of POST.id
Parameters:
group - the group to which direct access has to be established

initInclude

void initInclude(groovy.lang.Script script, java.util.List parentScripts, java.util.Map missingRequiredParameters, java.util.Map invalidParameters, java.util.Map parametersWithMissingDependency)
Initialize a script included into another rules script.
Parameters:
script - the rules script class
parentScripts - scripts that included this script
missingRequiredParameters - required but missing parameters
invalidParameters - parameters that did not pass validation
parametersWithMissingDependency - parameters that depend on a value of another missing parameter

initMain

void initMain(groovy.lang.Script script, java.util.Map parameters, java.util.Map environment)
Initialize a main rules script that includes all others.
Parameters:
script - main script
parameters - input parameters
